company_name.help: This is the name of your company

domain_name.help: This is the domain name of your website

fb_page_url.help: This is the facebook page for the company. Facebook.com/...

address.help: This is the primary business adress

business_phone.help: This is the business phone number

cell_phone.help: This is a personal cellphone number

fax.help: This is the business fax number

business_email.friendly: Business email / mail para el negocio

gmaps_embed_url.help: Only paste the url in the iframe not the entire code

fb_id.help: This is the facebook page id number. Automate or use http://findmyfacebookid.com/

fb_public.help: Is this page set to public so the feed can show in website?

cover_photo2.help: This is the url of the second cover photo. optional

cover_photo3.help: This is the url of the third cover photo. optional

price_range.help: This is the price range imported from facebook

product_list.help: This is the price range imported from facebook

long_description.help: Business description (our brief story. 1 paragraph) / Nosotros

slogan_text.help: These is the business slogan / Slogan del negocio(10-12 words)

extra_text.help: This is an extra text box in case the user wants to add some extra information

extra_text_headline.help: This is the title for the extra text box

cta_lead.help: This is the lead text describing the unique value proposition

cta_hero.help: This is the image url for the call-to-action

cta_button.help: This is the official call-to-action button

cta_email.help: This is the email address that the form will be sent to

custom_footer.help: The custom footer text at the bottom left of the page usually copyright info.

theme.help: This is the theme (and version) the customer has chosen

color.help: The customer has chosen this accent color. Use hex number (6 digits) without #sign. Do not include ###numbersign###

color_scheme.help: They choose between light, dark, neutral, and formal

font_family.help: Here it shows what they chose between the font_family options we gave them.

photo_section_title.help: Here it draws in the names of the ablums as categories. Recommended Fotos or Productos

primary_language.help: Here it shows what they chose as rimary language.

header.help: This determines of if you want the header section to show

about_us.help: This determines of if you want the About Us section to show

photos.friendly: Photos or products / fotos o productos
photos.help: This determines of if you want the photos section to show

news.help: This determines of if you want the news section to show

contact.help: This determines of if you want the Contact Us section to show

footer.help: This determines of if you want the footer section to show

footer_widgets.help: This determines of if you want the footer widgets section to show

sidebar_widgets.help: This determines of if you want the sidebar widgets section to show

header_navigation.help: This determines of if you want the menu section to show

business_name.help: This determines of if you want the business name to show

slogan.help: This determines of if you want the slogan to show

cover_photo.help: This determines of if you want the main cover photo section to show

profile_photo.help: This determines of if you want the header section to show

hours.help: This determines of if you want the open hours section to show

contact_info.help: This determines of if you want the contact info section to show

address.help: This determines of if you want the address section to show

map.help: This determines of if you want the google map to show

more_info.help: This determines of if you want the more info section to show

call_to_action.friendly: Call to action / invitacion para interactuar
call_to_action.help: This determines of if you want the call-to-action section to show

services.help: This determines of if you want the services section to show

fb_likebutton.help: This determines of if you want the facebook like button to show

fb_followbutton.help: This determines of if you want the facebook follow button to show

fb_followbox.help: This determines of if you want the facebook follow box to show

fb_sharebutton.help: This determines of if you want the facebook share button to show

fb_likebox.help: This determines of if you want the facebook likebox to show

fb_timeline.help: This determines of if you want the facebook timeline to show

fb_comments.help: This determines of if you want the facebook comments section to show

pricing_tables.help: This determines of if you want the price tables section to show

contact_form.help: This determines of if you want the contact form to show
